entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a young wizard who is facing expulsion from Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A strict but fair teacher at Hogwarts who is leading Harry to see Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, who may be able to help Harry with his situation.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts who was expelled but allowed to stay on in a different role.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends at Hogwarts who is becoming a wizard.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is leading Harry to see Dumbledore.
Harry may be able to see Dumbledore, who can help him with his situation.
Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts.
